name: The Open Source Spatial Electrification Tool
description: OnSSET is an open source, GIS-based tool for developing electrification investment scenarios towards achieving universal access to electricity in accordance with SDG7.

SDGs.evidenceText: The following publication presents the first application of the OnSSET tool, focusing on achieving SDG7 in sub-Saharan Africa by 2030, in line with SDG7.

organizations.name: KTH Energy Systems
organizations.contact_name: KTH Royal Institute of Technology - division of Energy Systems
